success_criteria: Audio or video element should avoid automatically playing audio
fixed_example:
<video controls>
<source src="bookstore-video.mp4" type="video/mp4">
Your browser does not support the video tag.
</video>

success_criteria: <b> <i> or <font> tag should not be used

error_fixes.problem_type: Use of <b>, <i>, or <font> tags
Font tags should not be used
Obsolete tags used
Use of <b>, <i>, or <font> tag
error_fixes.offending_line: <b> or <i> tags are used in the html which should be avoided for styling.
error_fixes.fixed_line: <b> and <i> tags should be replaced with semantic tags. To fix this issue, use <strong> instead of <b> for semantic importance and <em> instead of <i> for emphasis.

success_criteria: onmousedown event missing onkeydown event or script is not keyboard accessible

error_fixes.problem_type: onmousedown event missing onkeydown event or script is not keyboard accessible
error_fixes.fixed_line: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VIDEO_ID" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen onkeydown="if(event.keyCode == 13){event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); this.click();}"></iframe>

error_fixes.problem_type: onmousedown event missing onkeydown event or script is not keyboard accessible
onmousedown event missing onkeydown event or script is not keyboard accessible
error_fixes.fixed_line: <input type="file" id="myfile" name="myfile" onchange="this.nextElementSibling.focus();" onkeydown="if(event.keyCode == 13 || event.keyCode == 32) this.nextElementSibling.focus();">

error_fixes.problem_type: onmousedown event missing onkeydown event or script is not keyboard accessible
